      • traversable

        public boolean traversable(Coordinate coord)
        Check if a location is traversable
        Parameters:
        coord - Coordinate of location
        Returns:
        True if location has no blocked tiles and at least one unblocked tiles

      • gotSprite

        public boolean gotSprite(Coordinate coord,
                         java.lang.Class<?> type)
        gotSprite returns if a map coordinate has that sprite
        Parameters:
        coord - Map coordinate to check.
        type - Type of sprite to check a map coordinate for
        Returns:
        True if map coordinate contains one instance of the specified sprite

      • push

        public boolean push(int distance,
                    char direction,
                    Coordinate location)
        Pushes a block
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance to push block (negative to go backwards on axis)
        direction - Axis to push block along
        location - Location to push blocks at
        Returns:
        True if push succeeds, false if a block can't move

      • getSpriteAt

        public Sprite getSpriteAt(Coordinate location,
                          java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Gets the first sprite of specified type encountered at location
        Parameters:
        location - Location to look for sprite at
        type - Type of sprite we want
        Returns:
        The first sprite of type found at location

        Accesses app and reloads level

      • onPlayerMove

        public void onPlayerMove(boolean successful,
                         Coordinate newLoc)
        Event triggered by player moving. Adds history if successful, and moves enemies, regardless of success.
        Parameters:
        successful - Whether the player managed to move or was blocked
        newLoc - New location player is moving to

        Allows App to check if game is over
        Returns:

        public int getMoves()
        Allows blocks to save their move at a specific index
        Returns:
        What move index number we are up to
